entries.title: Use disposable android bodies to take down megacorps in this cyberpunk FPS

entries.title: Another one for the list of terrible adaptations—Aliens: A Comic Book Adventure
entries.description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.
